item.title: What is Data Science ?
item.description: “You can have data without information, but you cannot have information without data.” – Daniel Keys Moran Data science is one of the most debated topics in the industries these days. Its popularity has grown over the years, and companies have started implementing data science techniques to grow their business and increase customer satisfaction. According to a study conducted in 2013, 90% of the world’s data has been produced within the previous two years.
